title: didn't got mark of the guardian Icon

embed.description: They are protectors blazing bright, yet destined to collapse as furiously as they burn. They are the Star Guardians.

body: I never got my Star Guardian Icon can you tell me why???

replies.body: It can take *up to a week* to receive your icon. Sit tight while it gets sent out and if you don't have anything *after* a week, let me know.
It has been a week for me and I still haven't gotten mine.

> [{quoted}](name=Garnivorus,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XaJ9fmp5,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-10-14T02:26:53.971+0000)
>
> It has been a week for me and I still haven't gotten mine.

You will get it soon
I just got mines, thank you!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XaJ9fmp5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-13T03:43:58.158+0000)
>
> It can take *up to a week* to receive your icon. Sit tight while it gets sent out and if you don't have anything *after* a week, let me know.

Just got mine, thankyou very much

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XaJ9fmp5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-13T03:43:58.158+0000)

Thank you Targons Blade, Ill keep you up to date!
